SalesDatabase.Driver

Class SalesDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SalesDatabase.Driver.SalesDatabase

  • public class SalesDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    SalesDatabase class is responsible for managing the file system interaction and manipulation.
    Author:
    Vinayak Sareen
    See Also:
    Sales, InvalidFileException

      • binarySalesSearch

        public SearchResult binarySalesSearch(long orderID)
        Performs the optimal search operation for the searching in the sorted sales array. The operations are performed in O(log n).
        Parameters:
        orderID - order id describes the particular order.
        Returns:
        SearchResult
        See Also:
        Sales, SearchResult

      • sequentialSaleSearch

        public SearchResult sequentialSaleSearch(long order_ID)
        search for the sales record in the file system with order id.
        Parameters:
        order_ID - is the order id of the sale item.
        Returns:
        searchResult the search result which contain the count of operations to search the record and if the item is found.
